ocean.question: I am big and blue, fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live here.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am slow.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🏖️ You might see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have many arms!
⚫ I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I'm a type of fish with sharp teeth and love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I'm a predator of the sea.
🎬 You can see me in movies.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in anemones. What am I?

hints.text: 🟠 I am orange and white.
🏠 I live in a stinging plant.
🐠 Nemo is my friend.

ocean.question: I have a long, pointy nose and swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ⚔️ My nose looks like a sword.
🐟 I use my nose to hunt fish.
🌊 I'm a fast swimmer.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and is known for my playful nature. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I love to jump and play.
🗣️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🧠 I am very smart.

ocean.question: I am a very large whale that eats tiny shrimp and krill. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🧲 I filter food with baleen plates.
🎶 I sing songs.

ocean.question: I am a small, colorful sea creature that looks like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a horse-like head.
🪴 I wrap my tail around plants.
👨‍🍼 The male carries the eggs.

ocean.question: I am a creature that can sting you, and I float in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly made of water.
⛱️ I don't have bones.
💀 Be careful of my sting.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🪴 I need water and sun to grow.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can climb on me.
🍁 I have leaves that change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide nuts in my roots.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be red, yellow, or purple.
💐 People like to give me as gifts.
☀️ I need sunshine to bloom.

plant.question: I am small and round, and grow on a vine. You can eat me, and I'm often purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am used to make juice.
🧺 I grow in bunches.
☀️ I love the sun.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
💪 I am good for your eyes.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside and a sweet inside. I grow in hot places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am often found in the desert.
🏜️ Some people think I taste like a melon.
💧 I can store water for a long time.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows tall. You can make yummy bread from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 Farmers grow lots of me.
🍞 I am used to make toast.
☀️ I turn golden in the sun.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I am very hard to crack open.
🐒 I have milk and meat inside.
🌴 I grow on a tropical tree.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy.
⛱️ I am a popular treat in the summer.
🌱 You can plant my seeds to grow more of me.

plant.question: I'm a plant that drinks from the air. I am often hung up high. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I'm a type of epiphyte.
🌫️ I absorb moisture from the atmosphere.
🍃 I don't need soil to grow.
